wikipedia_page.main: John Richard Brinsley Norton, 5th Baron Grantley, FSA, FRNS (1 October 1855 – 5 August 1943), was a British peer from an English landowning family. He became known also as an antiquary and a numismatist.

response: *John Norton, 5th Baron Grantley (1855–1943), British peer and numismatist
